name: album-scraper
description: Scrapes albums from various sources then shows the album art in a grid layout

scripts.start: ln -f node_modules/isotope-layout/dist/isotope.pkgd.min.js js/isotope.pkgd.min.js;ln -f node_modules/imagesloaded/imagesloaded.pkgd.min.js js/imagesloaded.pkgd.min.js;ln -f node_modules/infinite-scroll/dist/infinite-scroll.pkgd.min.js js/infinite-scroll.pkgd.min.js;ln -f node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js js/jquery.min.js
